name: data-zg-*
description: Sets a ZingGrid attribute (Ex. data-zg-pager corresponds to the ZingGrid[pager] attribute).

name: data-zg-data-format
description: Specifies if the grid should copy the full html value of the data rows or just the text data.

name: data-zg-head-format
description: Specifies if the grid should copy the full html value of the head row or just the text data.

name: id
description: The id of the table. Use this value in `ZingGrid[data]` to specify <table> as the data source.

name: is
description: Set to "zing-grid" to convert this <table> into a grid.
